title: Emsisoft Anti-Malware 10.
description:
Emsisoft Anti-Malware is a comprehensive anti virus, anti malware and web protection which will help you to block virus, malware and phishing attacks. This powerful anti-malaware comes with a few computing resources yet smart proactive protection, so this anti virus only perform a bit of tasks at once and prevent your computer from overloaded or crash. Emsisoft Anti-Malware monitor all active programs in real-time which combined two of the best virus and malware scanning technologies to ensure optimum detection rates and maximum speed, it also allows you to control various aspects of your system protections such as control items on startup, schedule scan, and many more.

Features:

Monitor all active programs in real-time
Alert you to potentially danger programs
Game mode and offline mode protection
Phishing, security and privacy protection
Control incoming and outgoing connections
Surfing protection, file guard, and many more.

How to install?:

Disconnect from internet (Must)
Install Emsisoft Anti-Malware 10
Activate as trial and update
Now activate using license key
Reset trial periode using trial reset if backlisted
Run as admin and click reset
